fields.description:
Our artifact deploying scripts have started to fail with network errors.
We need to overcome this issue before cutting the next release, so marking as blocker.
fields.summary: [Packaging] Fix crossbow deployment to github artifacts

comments.body:
We may resolve this by using GitHub Actions and https://github.com/actions/upload-release-asset .
We may be able to use https://github.com/actions/upload-artifact instead of release asset.
